entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Hart Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:48 AM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hart Island 06:00 AM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023
Temperature: -0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -1.7°C
Wind: N 50 km/h gust 62 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending late this morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow this morning and early this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023
